name: Code Quest
description:
Thousands of years in the future, society has evolved to live in harmony with robots. But one day, an evil mastermind activates a secret code that turns all the robots evil. Using them along with an army of monsters, he threatens to enslave the land. Luckily, four heroic robots were having trouble connecting to the Wi-Fi during that time and were unaffected. Using these four robots, your goal is to fight off the evil army and save the world. To do this, you will write code in a simple language we’ve designed to control the robots. Good luck!

CONTROLS

Keyboard and arrow keys: Type code, as you would in a text editor

SHIFT+ENTER: Compile and run all code

CTRL: Speed up code execution

ESC: Cancel code execution

CTRL+M: Mute or unmute background music

The in-game tutorial teaches you everything you need to know. However, a more detailed description of the game's mechanics and programming language specifications can be found in manual.txt.
